name: Prison Break (Waysneighborgo2)
description:
Get ready to break your Prison Rules! In this game, your goal is to break all the rules that the prison has. But remember, all rules have consequences! Think about the next rule you are going to break, because it may prevent you from breaking another rule.

Submission for the Mini Jame Gam #16

Arrow Keys to move
E to interact
Click on a lock to unlock it with the key
